title: Won Poised to Jump 4% This Quarter on Boost From Policy, Inflows
description: The South Korean won is on track for a 4% gain this quarter, supported by government measures to curb volatility and a flood of foreign capital into local stocks, according to local analysts.
content: The South Korean won is on track for a 4% gain this quarter, supported by government measures to curb volatility and a flood of foreign capital into local stocks, according to local analysts.
